bannerText: For college students, new graduates, young professionals and career professionals.
pageText: From career launch to growth management, you don't need to walk alone. See the programs that have benefited thousands before you.
InterviewText: Gain the confidence you need to succeed in stressful job interviews.
InternshipText: Your opportunity to work on projects valued by the industry and mentored by industry professionals.
FocusGroupText: Join the mentor-led discussion group and learn to live out your destiny at work.
ProjectText: Be the change agent to transform your workplace into a better one, and help people transform theirs.
title: Practice Job Interviews with Experienced Professionals
des: Gain the confidence you need to succeed in stressful job interviews

contents.left: Gain confidence by practicing in a safe environment
contents.leftText: Start getting interviews by practicing in a group with people who are just like you or practice by yourself.
contents.mid: Get over fear of speaking during interviews
contents.midText: Gain confidence to face your prospective new employer.
contents.right: Practice your interview skills with experienced professionals
contents.rightText: Get feedback on your interviews from top professionals in the industry.

contents.whoText: I FLY YOUNG CCE is a nonprofit organization that provides opportunities for students and young professions to develop skills and experience needed to successfully enter the workforce. We are committed to providing access to careers that will empower them with the skills necessary for success in today's world.
contents.proSubTitle: People are afraid of job interviews
contents.problemText: The fear of the unknown is what makes us feel like we're walking on eggshells. We don't know what to expect, which can make it hard to prepare for them in advance. And that means you could easily end up stumbling over your words and looking unprepared when you finally do get called into an interview room.
contents.solutionText: CCE will help you gain confidence by practicing with experienced professionals who have been through countless job interviews already and can teach you how to deal with any situation that comes your way during a typical interview process.

contents.ltText: Get an insider's perspective on what it takes to be successful and get real hands-on training from someone who knows how things really work!
contents.mdText: Prepare yourself before an interview, learn how to avoid common pitfalls, and ace your next one.
contents.rtText: We believe in an ecosystem of giving and receiving, we want you to be a part of our community where your gifts can bless many and you can also be greatly blessed.

btmText: Join CCE for job interview practice group sessions and 1:1 sessions

projContents.projLeftText: Equip “Christians who have the burden to serve in the workplace” to transform your workplace into a beautiful place.
projContents.projRightText:
60 minute online meeting monthly
+
8 hours / month operation

projContents.projMainTop: Help you learn to use CCE's resources. Within one year, start a Project Transformation group among your colleagues/friends. Everyone submits at least one testimony about workplace ministry.
projContents.projMainMid: By attending the Project Transformation training, you will learn how to use the CCE weekly office hour material to start a new series of recurring meeting with your friends/colleagues at/known through work.
projContents.projMainBtm: The material provides practical and biblical guidance to help people address workplace challenges. Therefore, it is suitable for use in leading group discussion among Christians, as well as Seekers.

projContents.projBtmSub: If you can answer all of the following questions below, this training is meant for you:
projContents.projBtmLeftText: Please describe the people with whom you have burden/would like to start a group meeting (age group, years of work experience, how do you know them...)
projContents.projBtmText: Please browse through the CCE Office Hour recordings and identify at least 3 topics that you see suitable for your group meeting/discussion. (Please write down the recording dates and topics)
projContents.projBtmRightText: Have you attended CCE focus groups before? It would be very helpful if you've attended CCE gocus group before. If not, please also sign up for 2024-2025 CCE Focus Group.

projBtmText: Contact us for more questions: cce.info@iflyyoung.com
focusSubTitle: Don't miss out! Registration for Focus Group 2024-2025 season opens 08/17/2024 - 08/24/2024

focusContents.overviewDes: What is your meaning of working? Is it just a financial obligation? Or is it a dream? Do you want to know how to live out your destiny at work, and create the legacy to pass down to the generations?
focusContents.focusLeftText: No matter what your current circumstances are at work and/or in life, we sincerely invite you to join our Monthly Focus Group to re-examine the value of work and to be happy with what you have while working at what you want.
focusContents.focusRightText: The meeting is sponsored by I FLY YOUNG CCE, so attendees can sign up free of charge.

focusContents.topicDes: The monthly meeting will cover the topics like: Ask the right questions, Discover your talents, Capability and Passion, Changing career path, Time/Money Management, Workplace interpersonal relationships (setting boundaries, getting support from your boss, being a blessing to the company, boss, and colleagues).
focusContents.newGuy: Year 1 Focus Group: for first-time participants
focusContents.returnGuy: Year 2 Focus Group: for returning participant who attended the 2023-2024 season

focusBtmText: Contact us for more questions: cce.info@iflyyoung.com
